info.title: Growi API
info.description: API documentation for Growi platform, showcasing the public tracking event endpoint

post.description: Creates a new tracking event associated with a campaign creator

get.description: Retrieves time-series data for content engagement metrics within a specified date range

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results. Default is 4. Recommended is 20. Set to 10,000 to get all data.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: Filter snapshots by specific campaign ID. You can get campaign IDs from the Get Campaigns endpoint.

get.description: Retrieves a breakdown of content by platform within a specified date range

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results. Default is 4. Recommended is 20. Set to 10,000 to get all data.

get.description: Retrieves 24-hour views and engagement metrics with comparison to previous period

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results. Default is 4. Recommended is 20. Set to 10,000 to get all data.

get.description: Retrieves daily creator metrics tracking both new creators (who joined your database) and active creators (who made posts) with comparison to previous period

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

date.description: Date for the current day (YYYY-MM-DD format)

last_date.description: Date for the comparison day from the previous period (YYYY-MM-DD format)

current_new.description: Number of new creators who joined on the current date

last_new.description: Number of new creators who joined on the comparison date

total_new.description: Cumulative total of new creators in the current period

last_total_new.description: Cumulative total of new creators in the comparison period

current_active.description: Number of creators who made posts on the current date

last_active.description: Number of creators who made posts on the comparison date

total_active.description: Cumulative total of active creators in the current period

last_total_active.description: Cumulative total of active creators in the comparison period

get.description: Retrieves your top-performing creators ranked by total engagement within a specified date range

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results. Default is 4. Recommended is 20. Set to 10,000 to get all data.

200.description: Top creators by engagement retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieves your top-performing creators ranked by GMV within a specified date range

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results. Default is 4. Maximum is 20.

parameters.name: include_discord
parameters.description: Include Discord account ID and username for creators. Default is false.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: Filter results by specific organization ID

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: Filter results by specific campaign ID

200.description: Top creators by GMV retrieved successfully

total_gmv.description: Total GMV generated by the creator

connected_account_username.description: Username on the social media platform

platform_name.description: Name of the social media platform

profile_share_url.description: Direct URL to the creator's profile

total_gmv.description: Total GMV generated through this specific social account

has_more.description: Whether there are more pages available

get.description: Retrieves your top-performing posts ranked by views within a specified date range

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results. Default is 4. Recommended is 20. Set to 10,000 to get all data.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Default is 1.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of results per page. Default is 40. Maximum is 100.

parameters.name: include_gmv
parameters.description: Include GMV (Gross Merchandise Value) data for each post. Default is false.

200.description: Top posts by views retrieved successfully

external_id.description: External platform identifier for the post

gmv.description: Gross Merchandise Value for the post (only included when include_gmv=true)

get.description: Retrieves TikTok Shop Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) data with daily breakdown and comparison to previous period

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

200.description: TikTok Shop GMV 24h data retrieved successfully

date.description: The date for this data point (YYYY-MM-DD format)

last_date.description: Unix timestamp for the corresponding date in the previous period

current.description: GMV for the current date (formatted as currency string)

last.description: GMV for the corresponding date in the previous period

total.description: Cumulative GMV total for the current period

last_total.description: Cumulative GMV total for the previous period

order_count.description: Number of orders on the current date

last_order_count.description: Number of orders on the corresponding date in the previous period

total_order_count.description: Cumulative order count for the current period

last_total_order_count.description: Cumulative order count for the previous period

get.description: Retrieves TikTok Shop product-level Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) data with aggregated statistics

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

200.description: TikTok Shop Products data retrieved successfully

product_id.description: Unique identifier for the TikTok Shop product

product_name.example: Peach Perfect Inositol Multivitamin - Peach Perfect Myo-Inositol, D-Chiro Inositol, Omega 3 Fitness Healthcare

total_gmv.description: Total Gross Merchandise Value (revenue) generated by this product

total_orders.description: Total number of orders for this product

unique_videos.description: Number of unique videos that promoted this product

get.description: Retrieves the progress of manual campaigns

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results. Default is 4. Recommended is 20. Set to 10,000 to get all data.

200.description: Manual campaign progress data retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieves your top-performing social accounts ranked by engagement within a specified date range

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results. Default is 4. Recommended is 20. Set to 10,000 to get all data.

200.description: Top connected accounts by engagement retrieved successfully

data.description: Top connected accounts by engagement data

get.description: Retrieves your most active creators ranked by post count within a specified date range

parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results. Default is 4. Recommended is 20. Set to 10,000 to get all data.

200.description: Top creators by posts retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieves your top creators ranked by earnings within a specified date range

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results. Default is 4. Recommended is 20. Set to 10,000 to get all data.

get.description: Retrieves payout data with comparison to previous period

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results. Default is 4. Recommended is 20. Set to 10,000 to get all data.

get.description: Retrieves all user content creation data within a date range

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results. Default is 4. Recommended is 20. Set to 10,000 to get all data.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Default is 1.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of results per page. Default is 40. Maximum is 100.

parameters.name: include_all_time_views
parameters.description: Include the post's current all-time views in the response. Default is false.

parameters.name: posted_at_sort
parameters.description: Sort results by posted date. Use 'asc' for oldest first or 'desc' for newest first. Case-insensitive. If not provided or invalid, no sorting is applied.

post.description: Refreshes and re-syncs all creator social accounts data. This endpoint triggers a background job to update content snapshots and synchronize creator data across all connected platforms.

get.description: Retrieves transaction history including payments, payouts, deposits, withdrawals, and disputes with detailed financial information

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Default is 1.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of results per page. Default is 10. Maximum is 100.

parameters.name: child_organization_id
parameters.description: Filter transactions by specific child organization ID

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter transactions from this date (MM/DD/YYYY format)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter transactions until this date (MM/DD/YYYY format)

parameters.name: transaction_type
parameters.description: Filter by transaction type

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search transactions by creator name

formatted_amount.description: Transaction amount in formatted currency with sign

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid API key or viewer role

get.description: Retrieves all ambassadors from ambassador program campaigns for the organization. Returns ambassador profile information including their social accounts, custom field answers from their application, and contact details.

parameters.name: require_application
parameters.description: Filter to only ambassadors who submitted an application. Pass false to include all ambassadors.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Default is 1.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of results per page. Default is 20. Maximum is 100.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Filter by email (comma-separated for multiple)

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: Filter by first name (partial match)

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Filter by last name (partial match)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by email or name

parameters.name: approved_at_from
parameters.description: Filter ambassadors approved on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

parameters.name: approved_at_to
parameters.description: Filter ambassadors approved on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: Filter by campaign ID. Pass a single ID or array of IDs (e.g., campaign_id[]=123&campaign_id[]=456)

campaign_affiliate_id.description: Unique identifier for the campaign affiliate

joined_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the ambassador joined

platform.description: Platform name (e.g., Instagram, Tik Tok, Youtube)

social_accounts.description: Array of connected social media accounts

answer.description: The ambassador's answer (can be text or image URL)

field_type.description: Type of field: text, image, number, etc.

custom_field_answers.description: Array of application custom field responses

approved_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the ambassador application was approved

campaign_id.description: ID of the ambassador program campaign

campaign_name.description: Name of the ambassador program campaign

total_ambassadors.description: Total number of ambassadors matching the query

get.description: Retrieves detailed ambassador sales data including order information, commission amounts, and program details within a specified date range

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Default is 1.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of results per page. Default is 20. Maximum is 100.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by sale status

parameters.name: creator_email
parameters.description: Filter results by the creators (ambassadors) email address

parameters.name: affiliate_tag
parameters.description: Filter by affiliate tag

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: Filter by a Shopify order ID

id.description: Unique identifier for the sale record

avatar_url.description: URL to the ambassador's avatar image

occurred_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the sale occurred

due_in_days.description: Number of days until commission is due

refunded.description: Whether the sale has been refunded

get.description: Retrieves aggregated statistics for campaign ambassadors, grouped by individual affiliate. This endpoint provides performance metrics including revenue, commission, order counts, and clicks for ambassadors within a specified date range.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date in MM/DD/YYYY format

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: ID of the campaign to query

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Default is 1.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of results per page. Default is 20. Maximum is 100.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search across email, first name, last name, or full name

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Filter by ambassador email(s). Supports comma-separated values

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: Filter by ambassador first name (case-insensitive, partial match)

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Filter by ambassador last name (case-insensitive, partial match)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by tracking event status

campaign_affiliate_id.description: Unique identifier for the campaign affiliate relationship

creator_name.description: Full name of the ambassador (first + last)

revenue.description: Total revenue generated in dollars (for the specified date range)

clicks.description: Total number of link clicks (page views)

joined_campaign_date.description: Date the ambassador joined the campaign (MM/DD/YYYY format)

total_ambassadors.description: Total number of ambassadors matching the query (across all pages)

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

error.example: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait 2 seconds between requests.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available brands for your organization
Retrieves a list of all available campaigns for your organization
Retrieves paginated affiliate sales (conversions) for the organization. For website conversions, use store_platform=website. For Shopify, use store_platform=shopify_store with store_id.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Default is 1.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of results per page. Default is 20. Maximum is 100.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter sales from this date (MM/DD/YYYY format)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter sales until this date (MM/DD/YYYY format)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by customer name or email

parameters.name: creator_id
parameters.description: Filter by Growi creator/user ID

parameters.name: creator_email
parameters.description: Filter by creator's email address

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: Filter by campaign ID

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: Filter by external order ID

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by sale status

parameters.name: affiliate_tag
parameters.description: Filter by affiliate tag

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: Store identifier (required for Shopify, not needed for website)

parameters.name: store_platform
parameters.description: Platform type: website or shopify_store

parameters.name: ambassador_program
parameters.description: Filter to only ambassador program sales

row_count.description: Total number of sales matching the query

post.description: Creates a website conversion and attributes it to a campaign affiliate. Idempotent: sending the same order_id returns the existing sale.

422.description: Validation error or campaign affiliate not found

patch.description: Updates an existing affiliate sale that was created via the Public API (website platform). Only sales created through POST /affiliate_sales can be updated. Commission is automatically recalculated if total is updated without specifying commission.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the affiliate sale to update

404.description: Sale not found or not in this organization

error.example: Only sales created via the public API (website platform) can be updated.

id.description: Unique Growi identifier for the sale

total.description: Total order amount in cents. At least one of total or subtotal is required.

subtotal.description: Order subtotal in cents. At least one of total or subtotal is required.

campaign_affiliate_id.description: Affiliate tag for attribution (required if not using growi_user_id + growi_campaign_id)

growi_user_id.description: Growi user ID (required with growi_campaign_id if not using campaign_affiliate_id)

growi_campaign_id.description: Growi campaign ID (required with growi_user_id if not using campaign_affiliate_id)

total.description: Total amount in cents. If provided without commission, commission is recalculated automatically.

occurred_at.description: When the sale occurred (ISO 8601 string or Unix timestamp)

due_at.description: When the commission becomes due (ISO 8601 string or Unix timestamp)

commission.description: Commission amount in cents. Omit to auto-recalculate when total is updated.

occurred_at.description: Timestamp of when the event occurred

event_data.description: Additional data related to the event

subtotal.description: Subtotal amount of the transaction in cents. For example, for $40, input 4000.

conversion_platform.description: Which platform the conversion happened on

external_user_id.description: External user ID associated with the event

campaign_affiliate_id.description: Tag of the campaign affiliate associated with the event. Not required when `order_id` is present and the order is a recurring subscription.

subscription_start_date.description: UTC integer timestamp for the start of the subscription. Required only for subscription events.

subscription_end_date.description: UTC integer timestamp for the end of the subscription. Required only for subscription events.

product_id.description: The product or plan ID associated with the purchase. Required only for payment events.
